rooms.description: Serves as the entry point with a welcoming atmosphere. According to Vastu, it is placed on the eastern side for positive energy.
Spacious living area located adjacent to the entrance hall; includes ample natural light from windows facing east and north as per Vastu guidelines.
Adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring efficient movement; windows placed on eastern side to enhance energy flow.
Functional and well-organized kitchen with east-facing window for auspicious entry of light as per Vastu principles.
Small space allocated for storage and laundry; positioned near the kitchen.

additional_notes.vastu_compliance: The layout follows key Vastu principles by aligning primary rooms with cardinal directions.

home_theater.description: An entertainment zone integrated within the living area featuring acoustic panels and LED lighting; placed in a quiet corner away from high-traffic areas to maintain sound integrity.
